cosmic_conquistadors

Class Hitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosmic_conquistadors.Hitbox

  • public class Hitbox
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hitbox class represents a box which is used for collision testing.

      • edges

        public double[] edges()
        Calculates the x- and y-coordinates of the Hitbox's edges
        Returns:
        the x- and y-coordinates of the Hitbox's edges in a clockwise rotation starting from the left edge (left->top->right->bottom)

      • intersects

        public static boolean intersects(Hitbox first,
                                 Hitbox second)
        Calculates whether two Hitboxes are intersecting
        Parameters:
        first - the first Hitbox
        second - the second Hitbox
        Returns:
        true if the two Hitboxes are intersecting, else false
